thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Anthony Wood

author: Anthony Wood
title: Anthony Wood
text:
I could not possibly be more delighted with a tour guide than the great touring provided by Leandro. My days in Rio with Leandro have nor yet been completed but Leandro has been just exceptional.
Very fluent English and outstanding tours of the city during my four days here.
Tours by Locals is so fortunate to have such an outstanding guide for its services. I can recommend Leandro to all tourists to this city. You will not be disappointed.
I consider I was so fortunate to have him as my guide in Rio.
